description:
About Addi

We are a technology company working to transform credit and banking in Latin America starting with point of sale finance. We aim to build fair, simple and affordable financial services that empower our clients, treating them with dignity, and building financial freedom. We launched in February 2019 and have already served millions of clients and disbursed millions of dollars.

We operate as a full stack startup. We have built our core systems and processes from scratch, and we believe our technology and analytics platform will drive our progress into the years to come. We come at this with deep experience building and growing technology teams and financial products. As important as what we do is how we do it. We are a conscious company and are deeply committed to working and living our five core values - A company of owners inspiring colleagues, we pull rabbits out of hats, we care and we trust, act with integrity, win today every day, and scale exponentially.

We are backed by Andreessen Horowitz, Monashees, Village Global, and an outstanding team of individual angels, including Kevin Ryan, Josh Abramowitz, and Scott Weiss.

Mission

Design, implement, and monitor scalable ML models to better understand customer behavior and needs, enabling data-driven strategies that enhance engagement, growth and retention. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to transform insights into actionable solutions that drive Addi’s growth and enhance customer experiences.

What You Will Do


Develop and Implement ML Models: Design, implement, and scale machine learning and ML models to analyze customer behavior, optimize marketing strategies, and improve overall engagement with Addi’s platform. This includes leveraging techniques like supervised and unsupervised learning, propensity scoring, and recommendation systems.
Manage Data Pipelines and Model Deployment: Collaborate with data engineering teams to design and optimize data pipelines that support the seamless deployment of the models into production. Ensure that models are integrated efficiently and can be scaled, maintained, and monitored for performance in a live environment.
Monitor and Evaluate Model Performance: Continuously monitor the performance of deployed models, evaluate their impact on business metrics, and iterate to improve their accuracy, scalability, and overall performance.
Collaboration and Knowledge Sharing: Work closely with product managers, marketing teams, and stakeholders to translate data insights into actionable strategies, and actively participate in cross-functional meetings to align ML models with business goals.
Innovate and Improve Processes: Continuously innovate by proposing ML models, algorithms, or tools that enhance customer experience, optimize product recommendations, and improve overall marketplace performance.
Conduct A/B Testing: Design and execute A/B tests to assess the impact of different offers, product recommendations, and marketing strategies on customer engagement and conversion rates. Analyze the results to understand customer sensitivity to various factors and refine approaches accordingly.


Requirements


Technical expertise:
3+ years of experience in data science areas focused on client segmentation, marketing optimization, and recommendation systems, including end-to-end model design from scratch, development, deployment, and scaling.
Strong knowledge of statistics and mathematics.
Programming languages and tools Proficiency:
Proficiency in data management with SQL
Machine learning modeling: Python
Experience with python libraries such as TensorFlow/Keras/Scikit-learn/ PyTorch
Advanced expertise in machine learning algorithms:
Deep knowledge in classification models, particularly for propensity scoring: Proficiency in developing and applying propensity score models to predict customer behavior, such as the likelihood of purchasing a product, or engaging with a specific channel.
Experience in model interpretability: The ability to explain model results using SHAP, LIME, and other explainability techniques to ensure transparency and stakeholder trust.
Recommendation algorithms: Familiarity with collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, and hybrid models for product recommendations or LLMs applied to this field.
Proficiency in statistical methods:
Proven experience in A/B testing and experimental design: Designing, executing, and analyzing experiments to validate the impact of models and business strategies.
Values and Ownership:
Strong communication skills: Ability to clearly explain complex technical concepts and model results to non-technical stakeholders and senior leadership, influencing key business decisions.
Proactive Problem Solver: Demonstrates ownership by anticipating challenges, identifying opportunities for improvement, and taking initiative to drive solutions.
Customer-Centric Mindset: Prioritizes understanding customer behavior and needs to design solutions that enhance engagement and satisfaction.
Accountability for Results: Takes responsibility for the success of projects, ensuring models and solutions meet both technical and business expectations.
Ethical Responsibility: Upholds high standards of data privacy and ethical modeling practices.
Desirable Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in: Physics, mathematics, statistics, economics, or computer science.
Experience with marketplace platforms
Experience in data science roles at start-ups

Benefits


Work on a problem that matters and help change customers’ lives.
Build a lasting company from the very beginning, helping define every aspect of it.
Massive market opportunity ahead of us; we are growing faster than pretty much any other fintech lender was at our stage.
Work alongside a great and diverse team that cares about what we are doing and how we are doing it.
Generous compensation, including equity, 100% health insurance (and 1000% for dependents), flexible time-off, learning budget, and visa sponsorship for foreigners.


How The Hiring Process Looks Like


Meet with our recruiter for a 30-minute video chat. We will get to know you better, understand what you’re looking for, and answer any questions you might have about ADDI.
Meet with our Data Science Lead for a 60-minute video chat interview. Here, we will ask you questions about your technical background and basic computer science concepts. You will be able to ask any questions about the culture and how we work at ADDI.
Complete a simple take-home challenge within a 1-week window. With this technical challenge, we want to see your technical expertise solving a real-world problem. We expect that you invest 5 hours or less in developing a working solution.
Meet with a Data Scientists and the Data Science Lead for a 60-minute chat to talk about your take-home exercise submission and any questions you might have.
Meet onsite with one of our founders for a 30-minute chat to talk about the vision of the company, what we are building and how you will contribute to our product.

Job Description

We are seeking a talented Associate Data Scientist with a strong background in Generative AI to join our innovative team and help us push the boundaries of what s possible.

Your Impact


Develop and implement advanced machine learning models, with a focus on generative models such as GANs, VAEs, and autoregressive models.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and translate them into data-driven solutions.
Conduct research and experiments to enhance the performance and capabilities of generative models.
Analyze and interpret complex data sets to provide actionable insights and strategic recommendations.
Stay current with the latest developments in AI and machine learning, and apply cutting-edge techniques to real-world challenges.
Communicate findings effectively to stakeholders through reports, presentations, and visualizations.


Qualifications

Your Skills and Experience:


Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field.
2-3 years of experience in developing and deploying machine learning models, with a strong focus on generative models.
Proficient in Python programming.
Experience with Microsoft Azure, including Azure Machine Learning, Azure Databricks, and other Azure AI services.
Expertise in Python for data analysis and visualization, including libraries such as Pandas.
Familiarity with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Keras.
Strong foundation in statistical methods and data analysis techniques.
Excellent problem-solving skills with a keen eye for detail.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.


Set Yourself Apart With


Experience with large language models (LLMs) and their applications.
Publications or contributions to the AI/ML community.

NEORIS es un acelerador Digital que ayuda a las compañías a entrar en el futuro, teniendo 20 años de experiencia como Socios Digitales de algunas de las mayores compañías del mundo. Somos más de 4,000 profesionales en 11 países, con nuestra cultura multicultural de startup en donde cultivamos innovación, aprendizaje continuo para crear soluciones de alto valor para nuestros clientes.

Estamos en búsqueda de Desarrollador Front Cells,

Principales Responsabilidades


Desarrollo y mantenimiento de aplicaciones frontend utilizando tecnologías modernas como ECMAScript 6+, HTML5 y CSS3/Sass.
Construcción de Web Components reutilizables con LitElement y Polymer2, asegurando modularidad y eficiencia en el desarrollo.
Implementación de buenas prácticas de desarrollo, siguiendo guías de estilo y convenciones establecidas para código limpio y mantenible.
Colaboración con equipos ágiles para diseñar, desarrollar y entregar funcionalidades siguiendo metodologías como Scrum o Kanban.
Gestión del código fuente con GIT, aplicando estrategias de trabajo en Gitflow para control de versiones y flujo de desarrollo eficiente.
Desarrollo de pruebas unitarias para garantizar la calidad del código y prevenir errores en producción.
Integración continua con Jenkins, asegurando la automatización de despliegues y pruebas en el pipeline de desarrollo.
Optimización de rendimiento y accesibilidad en aplicaciones web, asegurando la mejor experiencia para el usuario.
Participación en revisiones de código y mejora continua, aportando mejoras y asegurando la calidad del desarrollo.
Aprendizaje y adaptación al framework Cells de BBVA, basado en Web Components y LitElement, para la creación de soluciones robustas y escalables.


Requerimientos


Experiencia de 2 a 3 años en desarrollo front
Perfil de desarrollo con ganas en aprender el framework de desarrollo Frontend propietario de cliente (Cells) basado en Web Components y librería LitElement (desarrollado por Google). Realizando labores de desarrollo en Polymer2 y LitElement, con un enfoque modular y centrado en la reutilización de componentes apoyado en catálogos de componentes.
JavaScript y conocimiento en guía de estilo, convenciones y buenas prácticas de desarrollo
ECMAScript6 (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3 o Sass
Desarrollo de Web Components con LitElement o con algún framework tal como ReactJS, VueJS, Angular o similar.
GIT
Test Unitarios
Integración continua (Jenkins)
Trabajo en Gitflow
Metodologías ágiles

Medicina prepagada.
Días libres adicionales.
Bono anual por mérito.
Seguro de vida.
Herramientas de aprendizaje y desarrollo.
Regalo de Cumpleaños
Bono de Vacaciones.


Te invitamos a conocernos en http://www.neoris.com, Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter o Instagram: @NEORIS.

industries: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Pharmaceutical Manufacturing
description:
EPAM is a leading global provider of digital platform engineering and development services. We are committed to having a positive impact on our customers, our employees, and our communities. We embrace a dynamic and inclusive culture. Here you will collaborate with multi-national teams, contribute to a myriad of innovative projects that deliver the most creative and cutting-edge solutions, and have an opportunity to continuously learn and grow. No matter where you are located, you will join a dedicated, creative, and diverse community that will help you discover your fullest potential.

We are seeking a Senior Data Scientist to join our team and play a pivotal role in the advancement of biomarker discovery and translational research.

As part of an innovative organization, the ideal candidate will utilize their expertise in biology, clinical trial analysis, statistics, and bioinformatics to enhance our platform's capability, providing actionable insights that directly contribute to oncology drug development and improved patient outcomes.

Responsibilities



Apply molecular biology, clinical trial analysis, bioinformatics, and statistics knowledge to develop advanced biomarker analysis pipelines
Enhance and maintain computational pipelines using Python, Nextflow, and SQL databases
Deliver scientific results in formats tailored for intuitive comprehension
Collaborate with biologists, bioinformaticians, statisticians, and engineers to tailor computational methods to clinical and biological requirements
Effectively communicate methodologies and outcomes to a diverse audience
Use AI and prompt engineering to further biomarker discovery efforts
Implement adaptable AI solutions for computational problems
Ensure computational and statistical approaches are sound, reproducible, and uphold scientific rigor
Continuously expand knowledge to stay at the forefront of computational biology, AI, and translational research



Requirements



Bachelor’s and advanced degree (MSc or PhD) in bioinformatics, computational biology, statistics, or a related discipline with a solid academic background
3+ years of problem-solving experience in bioinformatics and data science specific to biomarker development
An established background in clinical trial data analysis
Proficiency in statistical methods and machine learning techniques, including survival analysis, Random Forest, and Gradient Boosting
Skills in Python and SQL are mandatory, with some familiarity with Nextflow
Demonstrated ability to develop automated data analysis workflows
Strong competencies in data integration and data wrangling
Fluent English communication skills at a B2+ level



Nice to have



Proven ability to innovate using AI technologies
Capacity to lead multidisciplinary project teams
Experience with Amazon Web Services



We offer



International projects with top brands
Work with global teams of highly skilled, diverse peers
Healthcare benefits
Employee financial programs
Paid time off and sick leave
Upskilling, reskilling and certification courses
Unlimited access to the LinkedIn Learning library and 22,000+ courses
Global career opportunities
Volunteer and community involvement opportunities
EPAM Employee Groups
Award-winning culture recognized by Glassdoor, Newsweek and LinkedIn

This role is pivotal in recognizing business-related issues, analyzing data, formulating and authenticating models, and efficiently conveying results. The selected individual will play a major role in driving the adoption of data-driven decisions within our organization.

We welcome you to utilize your expertise to create an impact. Apply today!

Detection and solving of business problems through data analysis and modeling
Proficient data analysis and interpretation using Python and SQL
Formulation and verification of analytical models for diverse applications including Deep Learning, AI, and Time Series Forecasting
Concise and informative presentation of findings and insights
Cooperation with cross-functional teams to enable data-driven decision-making
Regular updates on the latest developments in Data Science and ML modeling
Involvement in the creation of Data Science solutions
Application of data visualization techniques for effective communication of insights
Use of NLP and text mining techniques for insightful results
Guidance and mentoring of junior data science professionals

At least 3 years of experience in Python and SQL for data analysis and modeling
Solid foundation in data-oriented applied mathematics, including statistical analysis and machine learning
Robust methodology for modeling and Algorithms, such as Boosting Algorithms
Expertise in data analysis tools and libraries such as NumPy, SciPy, Scikit-learn, pandas, and matplotlib
Comprehensive experience in ML Modeling for Deep Learning, AI, and Time Series Forecasting
Proficiency in at least one of the major Cloud providers (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Familiarity with the creation of Data Science solutions
Advanced data visualization skills
Experience with NLP and text mining
Aptitude for problem-solving

Nice to have

Familiarity with Big Data solutions, especially Spark/PySpark



We offer



Learning Culture - We want you to be the best version of yourself, that is why we offer unlimited access to learning platforms, a wide range of internal courses, and all the knowledge you need to grow professionally
Health Coverage - Health and wellness are important, that is why we have you and up to four family members in a premiere health plan. We have a couple of options, so you can choose what is best for you and your family
Visual Benefit - Seeing your work for us would be a sight for sore eyes. We want your vision to always be at 100% which is why we offer up to $200.000 COP for any visual health expenses
Life Insurance Plan - We have partnered with MetLife to offer a full-coverage Ife insurance plan. So, your family is covered, even if you are gone.
Medical Leave Coverage - We are one of the few companies that cover 100% of your medical leave, for up to 90 days. Your health is the most important thing to us
Professional Growth Opportunities - We have designed a highly competitive and complete development process, where you will have all the tools to get where you have always wanted to be, personally and professionally
Stock Option Purchase Plan - As an EPAMer you can be more than just an employee, you will also have the opportunity to purchase stock at a reduced price and become a part owner of our organization

Full Stack Developer – Detail-Oriented, Methodical, and Technically Driven




Luna Joy is looking for a Full Stack Developer who is methodical, detail-oriented, and technically driven to join our growing technology team. We value professionals who are organized, detail-oriented and thrive in a structured, collaborative environment. We need a dependable team player with an analytical mindset to enhance and maintain the front-end and back-end components of our digital platforms. In this role, you will work with GitHub, AWS, GoDaddy, and Asana to ensure optimal performance, scalability, and security of our systems.




Your responsibilities will include developing and maintaining web applications and services, writing clean and efficient code, managing repositories in GitHub, and deploying applications via AWS. You will optimize platforms for maximum performance, troubleshoot issues, and collaborate with teams to ensure seamless project execution. Our diverse 4,000+ team, composed of the world's Top 1% of tech talent, works remotely on roles that drive significant impact worldwide.

When you apply for this position, you're taking the first step in a process that goes beyond the ordinary. We aim to align your passions and skills with our vacancies, setting you on a path to exceptional career development and success.

Senior Machine Learning & LLM Engineer at BairesDev

We are looking for a Senior Machine Learning & LLM Engineer to lead and guide the development of innovative machine learning models and large language models (LLMs). Your expertise and vision will shape cutting-edge AI solutions, collaborating closely with a high-performing team to create impactful applications.

What You’ll Do


Design, develop, and optimize machine learning models and LLMs for various applications.
Lead and mentor a team of developers, fostering innovation and best practices.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement AI-driven solutions.
Perform in-depth data analysis and preprocessing, ensuring high data quality for model training.
Stay current with the latest advancements in ML, NLP, and AI technologies.
Ensure model scalability, performance, and security through rigorous testing and optimization.


What We Are Looking For


4+ years of experience in machine learning, AI, or related fields.
Advanced expertise in Python and ML frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn).
Strong knowledge of NLP and LLM technologies.
Proven track record in data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model optimization.
Solid experience with code reviews, CI/CD processes, and scalable AI systems.
Demonstrated ability to lead technical teams and communicate complex concepts effectively.
Advanced level of English.


How we do make your work (and your life) easier:


100% remote work (from anywhere).
Excellent compensation in USD or your local currency if preferred
Hardware and software setup for you to work from home.
Flexible hours: create your own schedule.
Paid parental leaves, vacations, and national holidays.

Development is the largest discipline at Endava. Our developers design, build, and release software products in multiple programming languages, frameworks, and libraries. Always collaborating with cross-functional project teams, our developers are adaptable problem-solvers with a client-oriented mindset.

Learn and apply new technologies, practices, and tools as appropriate to the project.

Share experience and knowledge gained from projects.


Qualifications


5+ years of experience in software development.
Proficient in relevant programming languages, frameworks, and tools such as Python, Django, Flask, PyCharm, Jupyter Notebook, or Visual Studio Code.

About Addi

We are a technology company working to transform credit and banking in Latin America starting with point of sale finance. We aim to build fair, simple and affordable financial services that empower our clients, treating them with dignity, and building financial freedom. We launched in February 2019 and have already served millions of clients and disbursed millions of dollars.

We operate as a full stack startup. We have built our core systems and processes from scratch, and we believe our technology and analytics platform will drive our progress into the years to come. We come at this with deep experience building and growing technology teams and financial products. As important as what we do is how we do it. We are a conscious company and are deeply committed to working and living our five core values - A company of owners inspiring colleagues, we pull rabbits out of hats, we care and we trust, act with integrity, win today every day, and scale exponentially.

We are backed by Andreessen Horowitz, Monashees, Village Global, and an outstanding team of individual angels, including Kevin Ryan, Josh Abramowitz, and Scott Weiss.

Mission

Design, implement, and monitor scalable ML models to better understand customer behavior and needs, enabling data-driven strategies that enhance engagement, growth and retention. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to transform insights into actionable solutions that drive Addi’s growth and enhance customer experiences.

What You Will Do


Develop and Implement ML Models: Design, implement, and scale machine learning and ML models to analyze customer behavior, optimize marketing strategies, and improve overall engagement with Addi’s platform. This includes leveraging techniques like supervised and unsupervised learning, propensity scoring, and recommendation systems.
Manage Data Pipelines and Model Deployment: Collaborate with data engineering teams to design and optimize data pipelines that support the seamless deployment of the models into production. Ensure that models are integrated efficiently and can be scaled, maintained, and monitored for performance in a live environment.
Monitor and Evaluate Model Performance: Continuously monitor the performance of deployed models, evaluate their impact on business metrics, and iterate to improve their accuracy, scalability, and overall performance.
Collaboration and Knowledge Sharing: Work closely with product managers, marketing teams, and stakeholders to translate data insights into actionable strategies, and actively participate in cross-functional meetings to align ML models with business goals.
Innovate and Improve Processes: Continuously innovate by proposing ML models, algorithms, or tools that enhance customer experience, optimize product recommendations, and improve overall marketplace performance.
Conduct A/B Testing: Design and execute A/B tests to assess the impact of different offers, product recommendations, and marketing strategies on customer engagement and conversion rates. Analyze the results to understand customer sensitivity to various factors and refine approaches accordingly.


Requirements


Technical expertise:
3+ years of experience in data science areas focused on client segmentation, marketing optimization, and recommendation systems, including end-to-end model design from scratch, development, deployment, and scaling.
Strong knowledge of statistics and mathematics.
Programming languages and tools Proficiency:
Proficiency in data management with SQL
Machine learning modeling: Python
Experience with python libraries such as TensorFlow/Keras/Scikit-learn/ PyTorch
Advanced expertise in machine learning algorithms:
Deep knowledge in classification models, particularly for propensity scoring: Proficiency in developing and applying propensity score models to predict customer behavior, such as the likelihood of purchasing a product, or engaging with a specific channel.
Experience in model interpretability: The ability to explain model results using SHAP, LIME, and other explainability techniques to ensure transparency and stakeholder trust.
Recommendation algorithms: Familiarity with collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, and hybrid models for product recommendations or LLMs applied to this field.
Proficiency in statistical methods:
Proven experience in A/B testing and experimental design: Designing, executing, and analyzing experiments to validate the impact of models and business strategies.
Values and Ownership:
Strong communication skills: Ability to clearly explain complex technical concepts and model results to non-technical stakeholders and senior leadership, influencing key business decisions.
Proactive Problem Solver: Demonstrates ownership by anticipating challenges, identifying opportunities for improvement, and taking initiative to drive solutions.
Customer-Centric Mindset: Prioritizes understanding customer behavior and needs to design solutions that enhance engagement and satisfaction.
Accountability for Results: Takes responsibility for the success of projects, ensuring models and solutions meet both technical and business expectations.
Ethical Responsibility: Upholds high standards of data privacy and ethical modeling practices.
Desirable Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in: Physics, mathematics, statistics, economics, or computer science.
Experience with marketplace platforms
Experience in data science roles at start-ups

Benefits


Work on a problem that matters and help change customers’ lives.
Build a lasting company from the very beginning, helping define every aspect of it.
Massive market opportunity ahead of us; we are growing faster than pretty much any other fintech lender was at our stage.
Work alongside a great and diverse team that cares about what we are doing and how we are doing it.
Generous compensation, including equity, 100% health insurance (and 1000% for dependents), flexible time-off, learning budget, and visa sponsorship for foreigners.


How The Hiring Process Looks Like


Meet with our recruiter for a 30-minute video chat. We will get to know you better, understand what you’re looking for, and answer any questions you might have about ADDI.
Meet with our Data Science Lead for a 60-minute video chat interview. Here, we will ask you questions about your technical background and basic computer science concepts. You will be able to ask any questions about the culture and how we work at ADDI.
Complete a simple take-home challenge within a 1-week window. With this technical challenge, we want to see your technical expertise solving a real-world problem. We expect that you invest 5 hours or less in developing a working solution.
Meet with a Data Scientists and the Data Science Lead for a 60-minute chat to talk about your take-home exercise submission and any questions you might have.
Meet onsite with one of our founders for a 30-minute chat to talk about the vision of the company, what we are building and how you will contribute to our product.

Ensure that models are integrated efficiently and can be scaled, maintained, and monitored for performance in a live environment.
Monitor and Evaluate Model Performance: Continuously monitor the performance of deployed models, evaluate their impact on business metrics, and iterate to improve their accuracy, scalability, and overall performance.
Collaboration and Knowledge Sharing: Work closely with product managers, marketing teams, and stakeholders to translate data insights into actionable strategies, and actively participate in cross-functional meetings to align ML models with business goals.
Innovate and Improve Processes: Continuously innovate by proposing ML models, algorithms, or tools that enhance customer experience, optimize product recommendations, and improve overall marketplace performance.
Conduct A/B Testing: Design and execute A/B tests to assess the impact of different offers, product recommendations, and marketing strategies on customer engagement and conversion rates. Analyze the results to understand customer sensitivity to various factors and refine approaches accordingly.


Requirements


Technical expertise:
3+ years of experience in data science areas focused on client segmentation, marketing optimization, and recommendation systems, including end-to-end model design from scratch, development, deployment, and scaling.
Strong knowledge of statistics and mathematics.
Programming languages and tools Proficiency:
Proficiency in data management with SQL
Machine learning modeling: Python
Experience with python libraries such as TensorFlow/Keras/Scikit-learn/ PyTorch
Advanced expertise in machine learning algorithms:
Deep knowledge in classification models, particularly for propensity scoring: Proficiency in developing and applying propensity score models to predict customer behavior, such as the likelihood of purchasing a product, or engaging with a specific channel.
Experience in model interpretability: The ability to explain model results using SHAP, LIME, and other explainability techniques to ensure transparency and stakeholder trust.
Recommendation algorithms: Familiarity with collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, and hybrid models for product recommendations or LLMs applied to this field.
Proficiency in statistical methods:
Proven experience in A/B testing and experimental design: Designing, executing, and analyzing experiments to validate the impact of models and business strategies.
Values and Ownership:
Strong communication skills: Ability to clearly explain complex technical concepts and model results to non-technical stakeholders and senior leadership, influencing key business decisions.
Proactive Problem Solver: Demonstrates ownership by anticipating challenges, identifying opportunities for improvement, and taking initiative to drive solutions.
Customer-Centric Mindset: Prioritizes understanding customer behavior and needs to design solutions that enhance engagement and satisfaction.
Accountability for Results: Takes responsibility for the success of projects, ensuring models and solutions meet both technical and business expectations.
Ethical Responsibility: Upholds high standards of data privacy and ethical modeling practices.
Desirable Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in: Physics, mathematics, statistics, economics, or computer science.
Experience with marketplace platforms
Experience in data science roles at start-ups

Benefits


Work on a problem that matters and help change customers’ lives.
Build a lasting company from the very beginning, helping define every aspect of it.
Massive market opportunity ahead of us; we are growing faster than pretty much any other fintech lender was at our stage.
Work alongside a great and diverse team that cares about what we are doing and how we are doing it.
Generous compensation, including equity, 100% health insurance (and 1000% for dependents), flexible time-off, learning budget, and visa sponsorship for foreigners.


How The Hiring Process Looks Like


Meet with our recruiter for a 30-minute video chat. We will get to know you better, understand what you’re looking for, and answer any questions you might have about ADDI.
Meet with our Data Science Lead for a 60-minute video chat interview. Here, we will ask you questions about your technical background and basic computer science concepts. You will be able to ask any questions about the culture and how we work at ADDI.
Complete a simple take-home challenge within a 1-week window. With this technical challenge, we want to see your technical expertise solving a real-world problem. We expect that you invest 5 hours or less in developing a working solution.
Meet with a Data Scientists and the Data Science Lead for a 60-minute chat to talk about your take-home exercise submission and any questions you might have.
Meet onsite with one of our founders for a 30-minute chat to talk about the vision of the company, what we are building and how you will contribute to our product.

industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Information Services, and Software Development
description:
La vacante actual es para un puesto en el equipo de Colombia, pero estamos en un modelo de trabajo desde casa (Free Office).

Quienes somos

Artefact es una nueva generación de proveedores de servicios de datos, especializado en consultoría de datos y marketing digital basado en datos, dedicado a transformar los datos en impacto empresarial en toda la cadena de valor de las organizaciones. Estamos orgullosos de decir que estamos disfrutando de un crecimiento vertiginoso.

Nuestra amplia gama de soluciones basadas en datos en consultoría de datos y marketing digital está diseñada para satisfacer las necesidades específicas de nuestros clientes, siempre concebidas con un enfoque centrado en el negocio y entregadas con resultados tangibles. Nuestros servicios basados en datos se basan en la profunda experiencia en IA que hemos adquirido con nuestras más de 300 marcas internacionales en todo el mundo.

Contamos con más de 1300 empleados en 20 oficinas en 17 países que se centran en acelerar la transformación digital. Gracias a una combinación única de activos de la empresa: tecnologías de datos de última generación, metodologías ágiles de IA para una entrega rápida y equipos cohesionados de los mejores consultores de negocios, analistas de datos, científicos de datos, ingenieros de datos y expertos digitales, todos dedicados a brindar valor extra para cada cliente.

Tus Responsabilidades

Te unirás a nuestro equipo de Datos y Consultoría, que ayuda a los clientes a transformar y mejorar su estrategia de datos mediante la aplicación de análisis avanzados para generar percepciones que crean valor comercial a partir de big data e inteligencia artificial.


Innovar: Trabajará con tu equipo, formado por consultores, científicos de datos, creativos e ingenieros, para identificar las necesidades de tus clientes y definir soluciones innovadoras.
Aprender y Compartir: Trabajarás en un equipo colaborativo que fomenta el intercambio de conocimientos. Aprenderás de otros, compartirás conocimientos y te mantendrás actualizado sobre noticias y actualizaciones de la industria.
Desarrollo: Participarás en la solución desde el principio hasta el final. Con la asistencia de ingenieros seniors, gestionarás el diseño e implementación, además de optimizar el rendimiento y la escalabilidad.
Trabajarás en toda la cadena de valor del proyecto (creación de infraestructuras y plataformas, recopilación de datos, aplicación de modelos de aprendizaje automático, creación de APIs REST, desarrollo de front-end, pruebas, implementaciones continuas).
Simplificarás términos técnicos o soluciones para perfiles más orientados a negocios, capaz de trabajar en un equipo con diversos antecedentes.
Priorizarás tareas, respetarás plazos y alzarás la mano en caso de riesgos o problemas.


Perfil

Haber completado una licenciatura en ciencias de la computación, estadística, ingeniería, economía o un campo relacionado.


Curiosidad: Siempre estás buscando soluciones innovadoras para tus clientes y participas en toda la cadena de valor, que puede incluir front-end, back-end, infraestructura de big data, modelos de ML, etc.
Colaboración: Compartir conocimientos es esencial para ti, y participas activamente en la difusión de información dentro de Artefact.
Emprendimiento: Aportas soluciones, nuevas ideas e innovaciones.


Tienes un buen nivel de inglés.

Por Qué Deberías Unirte a Nosotros


Artefact es el lugar donde estar: ven y construye el futuro del campo de datos.
Progreso: Cada día trae nuevos desafíos y oportunidades para aprender.
Cultura: La empatía y la colaboración están en nuestro ADN.
Emprendimiento: Te unirás a un equipo de emprendedores motivados. No nos rendiremos hasta que hagamos una gran diferencia en esta industria.


¡Ven y únete a nosotros!

We are seeking a talented Associate Data Scientist with a strong background in Generative AI to join our innovative team and help us push the boundaries of what s possible.

Your Impact


Develop and implement advanced machine learning models, with a focus on generative models such as GANs, VAEs, and autoregressive models.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and translate them into data-driven solutions.

Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field.

Proficient in Python programming.
Experience with Microsoft Azure, including Azure Machine Learning, Azure Databricks, and other Azure AI services.

Strong foundation in statistical methods and data analysis techniques.
Excellent problem-solving skills with a keen eye for detail.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.


Set Yourself Apart With


Experience with large language models (LLMs) and their applications.
Publications or contributions to the AI/ML community.

En Iceberg Data buscamos un(a) desarrollador(a) que participe en diversas actividades de desarrollo de software y en la creación de productos de web scraping para clientes nacionales e internacionales. Responsabilidades

Participar en el desarrollo de software, desde el análisis de requerimientos hasta la implementación de funcionalidades.
Crear y mantener herramientas de web scraping que automaticen la obtención y el procesamiento de datos.
Diseñar e implementar servicios backend basados en APIs, velando por su escalabilidad y continuidad operativa.
Ajustar y mejorar los scripts de scraping ante cambios en los sitios web objetivo.
Contribuir a las pruebas de calidad (QA) para asegurar el funcionamiento óptimo de las soluciones.
Optimizar sistemas existentes y proponer nuevas funcionalidades para maximizar la eficiencia de los proyectos.
Colaborar con el equipo para analizar las necesidades de los clientes y proponer ideas que las satisfagan.




Lo que buscamos

Inglés avanzado hablado y escrito.
Pregrado en Ingeniería, Ciencias de la Computación o experiencia equivalente.
Conocimientos sólidos de Python y práctica en herramientas de desarrollo de software.
Dominio del inglés para trabajar con equipos y clientes internacionales.
Buena base en principios de desarrollo de software, como control de versiones, pruebas unitarias y patrones de diseño.




Sumará puntos extra si…

Has trabajado con plataformas en la nube como AWS, Azure o GCP.
Manejas frameworks de frontend como React, Angular o Vue.
Tienes experiencia con bases de datos relacionales y NoSQL.




Habilidades que valoramos

Comunicación clara y habilidad para explicar conceptos técnicos a personas con distintos niveles de conocimiento.
Pensamiento analítico y capacidad de resolución de problemas, afrontando desafíos de forma creativa y eficiente.
Responsabilidad y autonomía, con un fuerte sentido de organización y compromiso con los plazos.
Trabajo en equipo: valoramos a quienes suman esfuerzos, comparten conocimientos y disfrutan colaborando.
Curiosidad y aprendizaje constante: siempre hay algo nuevo que descubrir en el mundo de la tecnología.




Lo que ofrecemos

Salario competitivo acorde a tu perfil y experiencia.
Días libres remunerados (vacaciones, licencias por enfermedad, maternidad, paternidad y festivos).
Tarjeta de alimentación para que puedas disfrutar de tu día a día sin preocupaciones.
Programas de desarrollo profesional y oportunidades de educación continua, para que sigas creciendo junto con nosotros.




Si deseas impulsar tu carrera en un entorno dinámico, rodeado de personas apasionadas por la innovación y comprometidas con cada proyecto, ¡queremos conocerte!




Sobre Iceberg Data

Somos especialistas en ofrecer soluciones de web scraping y desarrollo de software personalizadas que permiten a empresas transformar datos públicos en ventajas competitivas. Nuestra experiencia ayuda a organizaciones de diversos sectores a obtener insights estratégicos, optimizar sus operaciones y tomar decisiones informadas.




Trabajamos con un compromiso inquebrantable hacia la innovación y la calidad, adaptándonos a las necesidades de clientes tanto nacionales como internacionales. Únete a nosotros y sé parte de un equipo que impulsa el progreso tecnológico y marca la diferencia en el mundo de los datos.

description:
EPAM is a leading global provider of digital platform engineering and development services. We are committed to having a positive impact on our customers, our employees, and our communities. We embrace a dynamic and inclusive culture. Here you will collaborate with multi-national teams, contribute to a myriad of innovative projects that deliver the most creative and cutting-edge solutions, and have an opportunity to continuously learn and grow. No matter where you are located, you will join a dedicated, creative, and diverse community that will help you discover your fullest potential.

We are on the lookout for a talented Data Engineer to take a leading role in the construction and oversight of advanced data pipelines within our vibrant organization. This position offers the chance to engage in groundbreaking projects, utilizing state-of-the-art technology to boost data availability and insights. Your skills will be essential in converting raw data into actionable business intelligence, which will guide strategic decisions throughout the company.

Responsibilities



Perform analysis, profiling, and evaluation of data sources to ascertain quality and relevance
Engage in clear and effective communication with a variety of stakeholders, from technical experts to business professionals
Architect both logical and physical frameworks for our data warehousing solutions
Develop, deploy, and refine data pipelines to enhance data efficiency and storage
Liaise with the technical team in regular meetings and contribute to the resolution of support tickets
Collaborate extensively with technical and business departments to gather, verify, and document precise requirements



Requirements



Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science, or a related technical field, or comparable professional experience
At least 2 years of experience in a similar role, ideally with a focus on data engineering
Skilled in SFTP and API development for secure data exchange and integration
Profound experience with AWS Lambda for executing code responsive to events
Comprehensive understanding of AWS S3 for efficient cloud storage solutions
Proficient in SQL for effective database management
Experienced in utilizing Snowflake for cloud data warehousing
Demonstrated ability to communicate effectively with clients to fulfill their data requirements
Fluent in English, maintaining a B2 level of proficiency or higher



Nice to have



Knowledge of AWS Step Functions, AWS Glue, or EC2 for workflow and data task management
Experience in using Databricks for large-scale data processing on a unified analytics platform
Understanding of Git for source control management
Skilled in Airflow for managing intricate computational workflows and data processes



We offer



International projects with top brands
Work with global teams of highly skilled, diverse peers
Healthcare benefits
Employee financial programs
Paid time off and sick leave
Upskilling, reskilling and certification courses
Unlimited access to the LinkedIn Learning library and 22,000+ courses
Global career opportunities

EPAM Employee Groups
Award-winning culture recognized by Glassdoor, Newsweek and LinkedIn

Pluxee is a global player in employee benefits and engagement that operates in 31 countries. Pluxee helps companies attract, engage, and retain talent thanks to a broad range of solutions across Meal & Food, Wellbeing, Lifestyle, Reward & Recognition, and Public Benefits.




Powered by leading technology and more than 5,000 engaged team members, Pluxee acts as a trusted partner within a highly interconnected B2B2C ecosystem made up of more than 500,000 clients, 36 million consumers and 1.7 million merchants.




Conducting its business as a trusted partner for more than 45 years, Pluxee is committed to creating a positive impact on all its stakeholders, from driving business to local communities, to supporting wellbeing at work for employees while protecting the planet.




As we reinvent our employee benefits products and accelerate in the employee benefits and engagement market as now a listed group, the marketing team will play a vital role in accompanying business strategy and the growth ambition, relying on strategic initiatives to impact, grow and inspire our people and teams.




🚀 Your next challenge

Reporting to the Data Spoke Manager, as a Spoke Lead Data Engineer, you're a key member of the Spoke team and you will manage a team of Data Engineers to build, use and manage data ingestion solutions, work on multi-domain projects, apply best practices in the use of generic assets, monitoring and ensuring the correct use of the services provided.




What you will do:

Data Engineering:

Ingest data into the company data platform
Design Data Model (star schema, data vault) and tables (SCD pattern) to ensure data accuracy and relevance and to feed Power BI dashboard, IT systems, etc
Build optimized and cost-efficient data ingestion workflows on a hybrid infrastructure (on premise / cloud) mixing several technologies: Rest API, SQL & NoSQL databases, batch and files… with different latencies (from batch to Realtime)
Qualify the code (PR review) & guarantee quality of development
Participate in local, regional and global projects
Guide and lead Data Engineers in Data Spoke
Support in the review and use of global assessments and support in their improvement
Apply data engineering best practices, ensuring costs, performance and security




Data Platform:

ensure that the rules of use of the platform are respected
Enhance data quality following Data Governance principles
Ensure compliance with data protection law




Project Management:

Understand and interpret business objectives, adeptly converting them into technical workflows that align with our strategic goals.
Write technical specifications
Ensure the progress of development and delivery dates are respected
Follow technical workload of all Spoke Data Engineer
Collaborate with Data Spoke Project Manager to understand business request and define planning
Agile squad features tracking and coordination meeting and stand-up




Manage Spoke Data Engineer Team

4 Spoke Data engineers (internal + consultants) from Chile, Peru and Mexico
Ensure that best practices are followed, and usage of generic assets is understood by all data engineers
Collect Spoke data feedback processes and collaborate with Data Spoke Manager to ensure the evolution of Spoke Data Engineer.
Maintain a close relationship and alignment with the Data Hub Team, especially the Hub Lead Data Engineer and Hub Data Engineers.




🌟 You’re a match - What we're looking for:

Computer Science and/or any other engineering Degree.
At least 4 years building and managing ETL and ELT processes.
Advanced knowledge of data lake and data warehouse for analytical and operational purposes.
Advanced knowledge of data engineering tools and process (Azure platform)
Strong SQL skills: querying, procedures and basic administration tasks
Strong knowledge of Python (Scala is a plus).
Cloud computing: storage, serverless, API … (Azure is a plus)
Previous experience distributing computation with Spark (Databricks or Spark)
Devops principles with CI/CD (Azure Devops) and infrastructure as code.
Knowledge in AI Engineering
Fluency in English is required.
Agile Project Management (organized on Azure Boards)
Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Engineer Associate (DP-203) is a plus.




📍 Location:

Bogotá, Colombia




☀️ What we offer, Happy at work

* A meaningful job: Be the change! Help us build the future of employee benefits by bringing to life sustainable and personalized experiences and contribute to make a real impact on millions of lives. Our business model delivers not just for individuals but their communities too, by supporting local businesses and economies.

* A great culture: People matter – a lot! Be part of a multicultural team that moves as one in a fast paced and innovative environment. We respect and care authentically about our people, we embrace wellbeing and work-life balance, new ideas and we have a lot of fun!

* An empowering environment: Be yourself! At Pluxee we proudly embrace diversity and value the uniqueness of our talents, fostering an inclusive work place where all abilities are celebrated, and equal learning and growing opportunities are a given.

description:
We are seeking a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to join our remote team, contributing to ML pipeline design, development, and operating lifecycle based on best practices.

In this role, you will design, create, maintain, troubleshoot, and optimize ML pipeline steps, as well as own and contribute to the ML prediction endpoints design and implementation. Your collaboration with System Engineers to configure ML lifecycle management environment and support improvement of coding practices will be crucial.

If you're passionate about innovation, we invite you to apply and become part of our team!

Responsibilities



Contribute to ML pipeline design, development, and operating lifecycle based on best practices
Design, create, maintain, troubleshoot, and optimize ML pipeline steps
Own and contribute to the ML prediction endpoints design and implementation
Cooperate with System Engineers to configure ML lifecycle management environment
Write specifications, documentation, and user guides for developed applications
Support improvement of coding practices and repository organization in the science work cycle
Establish and configure pipelines for projects
Continuously identify technical risks and gaps, and devise mitigation strategies
Work with data scientists to productionalize predictive models while understanding the scope and purpose of the models built by data scientists and creating scalable data preparation pipelines



Requirements



3+ years of programming language experience, ideally in Python, with a strong SQL knowledge
Strong MLOps experience (Sagemaker, Vertex, or Azure ML)
Intermediate level in Data Science, Data Engineering, and DevOps Engineering
Experience with at least one project delivered to production in an MLE role
Expert level in Engineering Best Practices
Practical experience in the implementation of Data Products using the Apache Spark Ecosystem (Spark SQL, MLlib/SparkML) or alternative technologies
Experience with Big Data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Cassandra, GCP BigQuery, AWS Redshift, Apache Beam, etc.)
Experience with automated data pipeline and workflow management tools, i.e., Airflow, Argo Workflow, etc
Experience in different data processing paradigms (batch, micro-batch, streaming)
Practical experience working with at least one of the major Cloud Providers such as AWS, GCP, and Azure
Production experience in integrating ML models into complex data-driven systems
DS experience with Tensorflow/PyTorch/XGBoost, NumPy, SciPy, Scikit-learn, Pandas, Keras, Spacy, HuggingFace, Transformers
Experience with different types of databases (Relational, NoSQL, Graph, Document, Columnar, Time Series, etc.)



Nice to have



Practical experience with Databricks MLOps-related tools/technologies like MLFlow, Kubeflow, TensorFlow Extended (TFX)
Experience with performance testing tools like JMeter or LoadRunner
Knowledge of containerization technologies like Docker



We offer



Learning Culture - We want you to be the best version of yourself, that is why we offer unlimited access to learning platforms, a wide range of internal courses, and all the knowledge you need to grow professionally
Health Coverage - Health and wellness are important, that is why we have you and up to four family members in a premiere health plan. We have a couple of options, so you can choose what is best for you and your family
Visual Benefit - Seeing your work for us would be a sight for sore eyes. We want your vision to always be at 100% which is why we offer up to $200.000 COP for any visual health expenses
Life Insurance Plan - We have partnered with MetLife to offer a full-coverage Ife insurance plan. So, your family is covered, even if you are gone.
Medical Leave Coverage - We are one of the few companies that cover 100% of your medical leave, for up to 90 days. Your health is the most important thing to us
Professional Growth Opportunities - We have designed a highly competitive and complete development process, where you will have all the tools to get where you have always wanted to be, personally and professionally
Stock Option Purchase Plan - As an EPAMer you can be more than just an employee, you will also have the opportunity to purchase stock at a reduced price and become a part owner of our organization
Additional Income - Besides your regular salary, you will also have the chance to earn extra income by referring talent, being a technical interviewer, and many more ways
Community Benefit - You will be part of a worldwide community of over 50,000 employees, where you can learn, challenge yourself, stand out, and share your knowledge and experience with multicultural teams!



We accept CVs in English only.

Please note that even though you are applying for this position, you may be offered other projects to join within EPAM.
